page.title: 08ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: In Barrow-on-Trent there are no pubs but one social-club called Barrow-on- Trent D&D L.T.D Regd office.There is a playgroup.There was a youthclub at the village hall but some of the hall bur- t down so they can't have a youthclub anymore.There is usually a village fete, there is one this year in 1985 it takes place on the Greve&Harpur lawn at 12am to 3pm which is in aid of Swarke-ston church.Sometimes there is a midsummer reveles which is like a fete clayshoot. wellie-wang,Golfsports,Grand- raffle etc take plake.In Barrow child- ren play football but mostly play in the fleid and make dens.Adults do the- re gardens.Barrow try to keep there village tidy and beautfull
